questions.question: From the red cross, how do I get to the Hospital?

choices.answer: Keep straight on, then turn to the left.
Keep straight on, turn to the left, then to the right.
Keep straight on, take your second right onto King's Road.
Keep straight on, it's the building next to the shop.

questions.question: To get to the school from the red cross, do you go straight on and turn to the left onto Queen Avenue?

choices.answer: False
True

questions.question: Is the supermarket opposite the music store?

choices.answer: Yes, it's opposite the music shop.
No, it is opposite the cinema.
No, it isn't. The suppermarket is opposite to the bookshop.
No, it is opposite the florists.

questions.question: How do I get to Santa Lucía Hill from Biblioteca Nacional de Chile?

choices.answer: Go straight on one block, then turn to the right.
Go back one block, it's the building at the corner.
Keep straight on, then turn to the left and cross the street.
Go straight on, until you get Santa Lucía Subway Station.

questions.question: Is Estación Mapocho nearby La Vega?

choices.answer: False
True

questions.question: How do I get to Museo Artequín from Quinta Normal Subway Station?

choices.answer: Keep straight on, take your first right, then go straight on
Keep straight on, walk through the park, then keep straight on
Go Back three blocks down, it's the building next to the café
Go on five blocks, it's the building next to the school

questions.question: To get to the Bank, do I have to turn to the left onto Apple Street, go straight on and turn to the right?

choices.answer: False
True
